abstract: The iPhone 4S nicely incorporates some of the better elements of Android phones, like widgets.
snippet: The iPhone 4S nicely incorporates some of the better elements of Android phones, like widgets.
lead_paragraph: People who bought Android phones in the past few weeks could be forgiven for keeping that information closely held, lest they be drawn into a tedious discussion of why they didn't choose the shiny new thing - the thing, by the way, that was created by the most brilliant and adored technology innovator in recent history.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Android and Its Marvelous Widgets
